attributes.action: To remove the UAE off the ‘Red List’ by the Summer
attributes.additional_details: I believe this would be the right thing to do because the UAE is a very clean country and has the facilities to keep the environment as safe as possible. This should make the disease less transmissible. If quarantine is needed, then this can be done at home. The Government should definitely consider this as it benefits us as public to enter the country for valid reasons.
attributes.background: I want the Government to remove the United Arab Emirates (UAE) from the Red Ban List by the summer, so that travellers can visit the safe country without needing to quarantine in a hotel on return.
